meanings.definition: Resembling a germ in appearance or behavior.
meanings.sent1: The tiny, germlike creatures under the microscope were fascinating to study.
meanings.sent2: The scientist observed the germlike organisms multiplying rapidly in the petri dish.
meanings.sent3: The germlike characters in the cartoon made everyone laugh with their silly antics.
meanings.sent4: Her ideas spread through the company like a germlike contagion, influencing everyone.
meanings.sent5: The eerie, germlike glow of the fireflies lit up the night sky.
